name: Otter.vim
summary: Otter theorem prover input file highlighter
description: Highlight input files for the Otter theorem prover. ( http://www.mcs.anl.gov/research/projects/AR/otter/ )
install_details:
Put the following in your ~/.vimrc

au BufRead,BufNewFile *.in set filetype=otter
au! Syntax otter source /path/to/otter.vim
